DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial examine bioequivalence ( assessment expect biological equivalence two pharmaceutical drug product identical active ingredient ) Norditropin速 versus Nutropin AQ速 healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Two Products ( Norditropin速 Versus Nutropin AQ速 ) Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: No previous exposure recombinant human GH ( growth hormone ) IGFI ( insulinlike growth factorI ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.027.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Considered generally healthy upon completion medical history , physical examination , vital sign , screen laboratory result , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , judge Investigator The receipt investigational medicinal product within 1 month prior trial Current previous treatment recombinant human growth hormone IGFI Female childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method ( adequate contraceptive measure require local law ) duration trial Known presence history malignancy Diabetes mellitus Use pharmacologic dos glucocorticoid Use anabolic steroid History drug alcohol abuse
